Code review ACK 8d25926643cb84805bf3a9fbb289b269198898a8

> Not sure why this failed, maybe a cosmic ray?

I think so. I checked the `guix_build.log` and there's a source tar corruption issue. It would be extremely unlikely to be caused by the change here.

```
+ cd /distsrc-base/distsrc-01e9e2d1ca7f-arm-linux-gnueabihf
+ tar --strip-components=1 -xf /outdir-base/dist-archive/bitcoin-01e9e2d1ca7f.tar.gz

gzip: stdin: invalid compressed data--format violated
tar: Unexpected EOF in archive
tar: Unexpected EOF in archive
tar: Error is not recoverable: exiting now
```
